room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: Did the Pirate's Plunder with 10 people for a friend's birthday. It was challenging and took teamwork but we completed the room and found the treasure with a second to spare. Our game master was Sunshine and she was fabulous. The 60 minutes went so quick. Super entertaining!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: We loved the Pirate's Plunder! We had an amazing time even though it was just the two of us and the game was extremely challenging. We had great help from Lindsey - he was very nice and made the experience worth it. Can't wait to check out the other rooms.

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: This place is awesome! The game masters and staff were amazing and genuine. We did the Pirate's Plunder room and it was very well designed and thought out. We have been to numerous places and this was the best escape room so far! Big thanks to the owner Scott and staff for making it such a great experience. We will be coming back for sure to take a crack at their other great rooms!

room_title: Escape room "Pirate Plunder" by Mystery Room Houston in Houston
review: Visiting Houston and had an awesome time at the Mystery Room! We were in the Pirates Plunder room. The game was both challenging and fun. The staff was very friendly and welcoming. Thanks for making our last night in Houston so much fun!
